column2: "Afei dza odzi ekyir a medze sɔw do nye dɛ
column4: hom ndzi dɛw wɔ Ewuradze mu. Sɛ mekyerɛw asɛm kor no ara brɛ hom bio a

column2: "Hom nhwɛ yie wɔ mbɔdɔm no ho
column3: hom nhwɛ yie wɔ edwumayɛfo bɔn no ho
column4: hom nhwɛ yie wɔ twatsiatwafo no ho;"

column2: "na twatsiatwafo no ara nye hɛn a yɛnam Nyankopɔn Sunsum do som
column3: na yɛhyehyɛ hɛnho wɔ Kraest Jesus mu
column4: na yɛmmfa hɛn werɛ nnhyɛ honam mu ndzɛmba mu no."

column2: "Nkyɛ mara so mowɔ biribi wɔ honam mu a medze mo werɛ hyɛ mu: na sɛ nyimpa biara bu dɛ ɔwɔ honam mu biribi a ɔdze no werɛ bɛhyɛ mu a
column3: emi mbom na mowɔ no mbordo:"
wotwaa me twatsia da a otsia awɔtwe no
column6: Hebriwfo mu Hebriwnyi; mbra no afamu a

column3: metaan asɔr no araa yie; mbra mu tsenenee afamu a
dza ɔyɛɛ mfaso maa me no
ampaara meda ho mubu ne nyina ahwerdze wɔ m’Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ho nyimdzee kɛse no ntsi. Ne ntsi so nna mubu ndzɛmba nyina ahwerdze
column4: na mubu ne nyina dɛ sumina do wura ama meenya Kraest ayɛ me mfaso
column6: "na woeehu me wɔ no mu dɛ minnyi mankasa me tsenenee bi a ofi mbra no mu
column7: na mbom dza ɔnam Kraest ho gyedzi do a
column9: na ɔnam gyedzi do ba no:"

column4: na meenya kyɛfa wɔ n’amandzehu no mu
column5: na ɔaama mayɛ dɛ ɔno wɔ no wu no mu;"

column2: "kyerɛkyerɛ me nsa bɛka wusoɛr no a."

column3: anaa menya medzi mu dada: na mbom mepem kɔ m’enyim ara dɛ bi a me nsa bɛka dza ɔnam do ma Kraest Jesus so ne nsa aka me no."
mummbu moho dɛ me nsa enya aka
column4: na mbom adze kor na meyɛ
column5: mo werɛ fir dɛm ndzɛmba adadaw no nyina
column6: na motwe mo mu kɔ enyim dze no ho
column8: "mepem kɔ kan dɛ mubodu botae no ho
column9: ama meekenya Nyankopɔn no sor frɛ a ɔwɔ Kraest Jesus mu no no konyim akyɛdze no."

column3: hom mma hɛn mu dodow a yeedzi mu no ndwen dɛm
column4: na sɛ hom dwen biribi fofor bi a
column5: ɔnoara na Nyankopɔn beyi akyerɛ hom:"

column2: "na mbom dza yeedu ho dada no
column3: noara so do na hom mma yendua nnantsew."

column4: na hom nhyɛ hɔn a wɔnantsew dɛ mbrɛ hom enya hɛn ayɛ fasusu no nsew."

column2: "Na dodowara wɔ hɔ a maka hom hɔn nantsewee ho asɛm
column3: na seseiara so medze nyinsuwa reka kyerɛ hom
column4: dɛ wɔyɛ Kraest ne mbeamudua no ho atamfo:"
hɔn ahohyehyɛ wɔ hɔn enyito mu
column5: na hɔn adwen tsim asaase do ndzɛmba nko do."

column3: hɛn mantsimadze wɔ sor; na ofi hɔ na hɛn enyi da Ewuradze Jesus Kraest kwan."

column2: "Ɔno nna ɔbɛsakyer hɛn ahobrɛadze nyimpadua no ma aasɛ n’enyimnyam nyimpadua
column3: dɛ mbrɛ tum ndzeyɛɛ a ɔdze tum brɛ ndzɛmba nyina adze hyɛ n’ase no tse."
